channel.title: 2022 on Andrew's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2022 on Andrew's Blog

item.title: Hello 2022!
item.description: Hello 2022: Today is the first day of 2022. This world has changed a lot since Covid-19 for almost two years, and yesterday I saw many countries and cities celebrate New Year’s Eve and had firework shows. And I hope it’s the final stage of Covid-19, and this world can go back to normal, and people cannot worry about this virus, meet their family or friends, and travel this world to explore their futures.
